Install solar panels: Solar panels can be installed on the roof or walls of a building to generate electricity for running fans or other cooling devices.
Use natural ventilation: Opening windows and doors can help to circulate fresh air and reduce the temperature in a room.
Use a space heater: Space heaters can be used to heat up specific areas of a room, such as the living room or bedroom.
Use a humidifier: Humidifiers can help to regulate the temperature and humidity in a room, making it more comfortable.
Install a fireplace: A fireplace can be used to heat up a room, providing a warm and cozy atmosphere.
